price: Und die Ginn haben Wir zuvor aus dem Feuer des Glutwindes erschaffen.
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
